keyMoments.title: Loss of 2nd Division Commander Ace
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates lose their beloved 2nd Division Commander Portgas D. Ace, who dies protecting Luffy from Admiral Akainu.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating loss for the crew, losing one of their most beloved members and commanders.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Pirates' Furious Assault on Akainu
keyMoments.description: Driven by rage and grief over Ace's death, the Whitebeard Pirates launch a furious attack on Admiral Akainu.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the deep bonds within the crew and their love for Ace, demonstrating they are truly a family.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a white mustache resembling Whitebeard's, with crossed bones behind it
